name: q-advanced-throttle
description: A throttling object built on top of the Q.js package that provides an easy way set the maximum concurrency (parallel operations) of promised tasks.  derived from christopther down's q-throttle gist (https://gist.github.com/1725325) this version incorporates additional events and returns an outcomes object of the throttle activities broken out by success/failure
author: Eric Schleicher
